components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Voice Numbers Getting Tagged as Spam Using Twilio Verify

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing Voice Numbers getting tagged as spam using Twilio Verify and we are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: ACCOUNT SECURITY - Verify

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays When Sending to IDC/Unite in Moldova

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to IDC/Unite network in Moldova. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to IDC/Unite network in Moldova. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to IDC/Unite in Moldova. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Errors for the Twilio Rest API Impacting Multiple Twilio Services

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate issues impacting the Programmable Messaging API, TaskRouter, Proxy and Programmable Video starting at approximately 5:16 AM UTC. During this period, about 0.1% of Programmable Messaging API requests (~2,500 requests) returned 5xx errors. TaskRouter is seeing approximately 80 errors (503) from Proxy and Video is reporting 106 requests with status 503. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

PROGRAMMABLE VIDEO - Video Insights
PROXY

FLEX - Proxy

During this period, about 0.1% of Programmable Messaging API requests (~2,500 requests) returned 5xx errors. TaskRouter is seeing approximately 80 errors (503) from Proxy and Video is reporting 106 requests with status 503. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Personnal Communicational, Win Mobile and Volna mobile

incident_updates.body: The Personnal Communicational, Win Mobile and Volna mobile networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 01 September 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 01 September 2025 at 13:59 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Personnal Communicational, Win Mobile and Volna mobile Russia handsets.
